sentences.english: The modern metrical poetry together with the free verse achieved the great brilliance in one-hundred-year Chinese poetry.
sentences.chinese: 现代格律诗与自由诗共同创造了百年现代汉诗的辉煌。

sentences.english: He has composed 52 moderhythmical poems which can be classified into the styles of neat speech and mixed speech.
sentences.chinese: 他创作现代格律诗52首，分齐言体和杂言体两大类。

sentences.english: The holes in Gruyere are due to aeration.
sentences.chinese: 格律耶尔干酪气孔多是由于通风所致。

sentences.english: In the history of contemporary literature, the theory of modern metrics raised by He Qifang is of great impact.
sentences.chinese: 他提出的现代格律诗理论在现当代文学史上影响较大。

sentences.english: In other words, meter is something Frost knows how to use.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，弗罗斯特知道怎么使用格律。

sentences.english: The central issue of modern metrical poetry is the artistic experiment.
sentences.chinese: 现代格律诗建设的中心问题是艺术实验。

sentences.english: Unlike free verse , they are traditional metrical verses and semi-metrical verses.
sentences.chinese: 不同于新诗，它们是旧体或变体的格律诗。

sentences.english: Compared with He Xun, Yin Keng s poetry was clear and fresh, and very mature in form.
sentences.chinese: 比起何逊，阴铿的诗格律非常成熟，形式浏亮新俊。

sentences.english: This time Six-character poem has completed the classical Chinese poetry rules process.
sentences.chinese: 这一时期六言诗完成了格律化过程。

sentences.english: Laws of classical Chinese poetry are invariably derived from nature, so are its forms and rules.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代诗歌的种种法则都源于自然，格律同样如此。

sentences.english: In that meter, too, we're hearing some of Frost's modernity.
sentences.chinese: 在这种格律中，我们也能感受到弗罗斯特的现代性。
